page.title: 02The Teachers' Centre
page.content: The Teachers' Centre is close to and just to the west of Newton Park College. It has been there for about three years (since 1982) and the present warden for about ten months. He is really a teacher but he is working as a warden for a year. The centre used to be right in Bath. Teachers come to the centre to borrow equipment like tapes,tape recorders and video recorders. Courses for teachers are also held there. For example computer software workshop and listening resources workshop. They also have meetings there and it helps schools who are involved in the Domesday Project.
